config.question: Those who came to the United States agreeing to serve a master for a stated number of years in exchange for transportation across the Atlantic were called __________.

answer_3.response: Incorrect. Consider This: The length of service depended in part on the age of the migrant. This form of service was the dominant form of labor in the Chesapeake colonies before slavery. See L.O. 2.1 Why did the Chesapeake colonies not prosper during the earliest years of settlement?
